short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sales Copilot for LinkedIn. Send personalized messages by using your custom prompts and the prospect's profile data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of spending your day crafting LinkedIn messages? We get it - manual outreach is a huge time sink. That's why we built this extension to handle the heavy lifting, so you can focus on what matters: building real connections.

Here's how it works: The extension seamlessly pulls prospect information from Sales Navigator and combines it with your messaging playbook. Whether you prefer ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini, it'll help you create authentic, personalized messages that resonate with each prospect.

The best part? No more jumping between tabs or copy-pasting profile details. Just set up your custom templates once, and generate tailored messages with a single click. Your sales scripts stay consistent while each message feels personal and relevant.

What you'll love:
• Works seamlessly with ChatGPT, Claude and Gemini
• Completely free (just bring your own API keys)
• Create your own custom message templates
• Generate personalized messages in one click
• Automatically captures prospect details
• Integrates directly with Sales Navigator
• Automatically populate in LinkedIn connect/message windows

We're just getting started! Coming soon:
• Support for regular LinkedIn profiles (not just Sales Navigator)
• Direct integration with your CRM

Ready to get started? You'll just need a Sales Navigator account and API keys for either ChatGPT, Claude or Gemini.

Give your outreach the personal touch it deserves - without the manual effort.
